thread.title_full: 'Ssul Jeon' takes over as Korea's favorite TV program | allkpop.com

title: 'Ssul Jeon' takes over as Korea's favorite TV program | allkpop.com
text:
Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me 'Ssul Jeon' takes over as Korea's favorite TV program By jennywill 5 minutes ago 800 31 0 0 Google+ ' Ssul Jeon ' has taken over the list of Korea's favorite TV programs.
The usual #1 of the list is MBC 's ' Infinity Challenge ', but for February, the JTBC debate program took number one with 11.2% of the votes. 'Infinity Challenge' ranked #2 with 8.7% of the votes, followed by SBS drama ' Defendant ' with 7.7%, MBC drama ' Rebel ' with 5.8%, and KBS ' ' 1 Night 2 Days ' and MBC 's drama ' Blow Breeeze ' tied with 4.0%. 
Korea Gallup said, " It's true that 'Infinity Challenge' taking a break had something to do with 'Ssul Jeon' being #1. However, the biggest reason is the increase in interest in the government administration, impeachment, and the upcoming election.
